metadata.title: CVE-2019-18222 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
The ECDSA signature implementation in ecdsa.c in Arm Mbed Crypto 2.1 andMbed TLS through 2.19.1 does not reduce the blinded scalar before computingthe inverse, which allows a local attacker to recover the private key viaside-channel attacks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18222` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto7 - 2.16.4-1ubuntu2
libmbedtls14 - 2.16.4-1ubuntu2
libmbedx509-1 - 2.16.4-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.4-1ubuntu2').
